text: [Music]
the iPhone 6 and the iPhone six-plus are
many things but the main thing they are
is bigger the iPhone 6 goes to 4.7
inches which actually isn't that big the
Samsung Galaxy s5 has a 5.1 inch display
the LG g2 is 5.2 inches and that's
almost like the new normal but I will
say this is a really nice pocketable
size for a lot of people the iPhone 6
plus on the other hand now that's a big
phone it has a 5.5 inch display but it's
very tall and narrow it's huge compared
to the iPhone 5s and even compared to
the LG g3 which technically has the same
screen size the LG g3 has a nice curved
back but both of the iPhones are very
thin and have these rounded edges and
frankly they're kind of slippery because
of the size of the phones Apple's
introduced a new feature called reach
ability which is basically a one handed
mode you double tap on the home screen
and then the entire display slides down
to the bottom half it's pretty neat but
I haven't found it that useful I noticed
that in this mode I can't access the
keyboard and I can't scroll down far
enough in an email to do something like
reply I do like though another feature
called display zoom when you first set
up the phone you'll be asked if you want
to view things in normal or zoom mode
and you can change this mode later in
the settings it basically lets you zoom
in on messages mail or even the home
screen everything looks a little bigger
and I like it because I'm old landscape
mode gets a lot better in both of these
phones in fact even the home screen now
switches when you turn the phone
sideways and in apps like mail you get
nice new rows and columns and a whole
new display
unfortunately the iPhone 6 plus is so
big that in landscape mode I found it
almost impossible to type on and even
though the phones are bigger when
they're in upright mode the keyboards
don't get any new keys ones like the
galaxy s5 have a row of numbers along
the top and also useful keys
like the period and the comma which I
would love to see on the Apple keyboard
the iPhone 6 is definitely nicer in a
slightly bigger size and in fact I
almost wish it was more like 5 inches
but I feel like Apple just didn't know
how to take advantage of that big iPhone
6 plus take the Galaxy Note 4 for
example it's 5.7 inches but Samsung lets
you do a lot more with it you can
actually resize app windows and move
them around the screen so that it works
more like a desktop computer and of
course that phablet comes with a stylus
which a lot of people love on the other
hand the iPhone 6 plus is just bigger it
turns out that that might not be enough
[Music]
all
